notes.title: About Me Draft
notes.content: I'm Martin Heßmann, a Product Generalist who bridges the gap between design, development, and business needs.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: I'm neither exclusively a PM, Developer, nor Designer—but a blend of all three, helping teams create intuitive, accessible, and impactful digital experiences.

sections.title: Approach
sections.content: With over a decade in the tech industry, I've developed a holistic approach to product development:
